messages.content: You are a helpful AI assistant.
What types of monsters are difficult for investigators to defeat?

Deep ones, byakhees, dimensional shamblers, fire vampires, ghasts, ghouls, servants of Gla'aki, mi-go, moon-beasts, nightgaunts, rat-things, sand-dwellers, serpent people, insects from Shagghai, tcho-tcho, and human cultists.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Why do many scenarios feature cultists, deep ones, mi-go, and ghouls?
They make approximately human-scale adversaries.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What should investigators not do when dealing with Mythos entities?
Humanize them. Their goals, knowledge, and abilities should be difficult to fathom.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How do Mythos entities affect investigators?
They can draw madness down upon the inquisitive investigator.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Can investigators defeat all monsters in combat?
No, some monsters require investigators to flee or hide.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What types of monsters can investigators 'take on' in combat?
Monsters like tcho-tcho, human cultists, and some of the other entities listed, can be 'taken on' in combat.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Who developed unpronounceable names for his monsters?
Lovecraft
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What was the goal of Lovecraft's monster names?
To drive home their alien quality
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the pronunciation of Azathoth?
AZ-uh-thoth
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the pronunciation of Cthulhu?
sigh-AE-guh
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the pronunciation of Nyarlathotep?
Nyogtha
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the pronunciation of Quachil Uttaus?
KWAH-chil oo-TAUS
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Who developed unpronounceable names for his monsters?
Lovecraft
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the pronunciation of Azathoth?
AZ-uh-thoth
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the pronunciation of Nyarlathotep?
NIGH-ar-LAT-hoe-tep
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the pronunciation of Cthulhu?
sigh-AE-guh
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the pronunciation of Nyogtha?
nee-AUG-thah
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the pronunciation of Byakhee?
b’YAHK-ee
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the default combat skill for every monster, except a few exceptions?
Fighting skill—a generic combat skill covering all manner of strikes, kicks, claws, teeth, tentacles, elbows, head butts, etc.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What does the term 'Fighting skill' cover?
all manner of strikes, kicks, claws, teeth, tentacles, elbows, head butts
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What monsters have a different combat skill than the default 'Fighting skill'?
a few exceptions
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What skill is required for monsters, except a few exceptions, when engaging in combat?
the generic combat skill
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What skill covers various forms of combat?
covering all manner of strikes, kicks, claws, teeth, tentacles, elbows, head butts, etc.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the generic term for all types of physical attacks?
strikes, kicks, claws, teeth, tentacles, elbows, head butts, etc.
